1.0.0.name: wordpress/snagfilms-player-embed
1.0.0.description:
Use SnagFilms Player Embed to embed a film from SnagFilms.com into any page/post on your site.

Embed the SnagFilms Player using shortcode '[snagfilm id="FILM-ID-HERE"]'; replacing 'FILM-ID-HERE' with the id of the desired SnagFilm.

Useful plugins:

  • "iframe" - Use iframe to embed video from YouTube or Vimeo or to embed Google Map or just to embed content from external page with a shortcode.
  • "Embedded Video" - Easy embedding of videos from lots of portals or local video files of many file formats with optional generation of a corresponding link.
